translations: 审查（vet 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She was secretly vetted before she ever undertook any work for me.
sentences.translation: 她在为我承担任何工作之前受到了秘密审查。

sentences.sentence: All reports are vetted before publication.
sentences.translation: 所有报道都要经过仔细检查后才能发表。

sentences.sentence: All candidates are carefully vetted for security reasons.
sentences.translation: 由于安全的缘故，所有的求职申请人都要经过严格的审查。
